vocabInfos.lsjDefs:
συγκοινων-έω,
have a joint share of, τῆς δόξης ταύτης [Refs 4th c.BC+]; to be connected with, τῆς κνήμης [Refs 5th c.BC+]; σ. τινί τινος go shares with one in a thing, [Refs 2nd c.AD+]
__2 in “NT” with dative, take part in, have fellowship with, ταῖς ἁμαρτίαις [NT]
vocabInfos.shortDef: to share with, be connected with
vocabInfos.mediumDef:
to share with, be connected with
to be a joint partaker, participate with, a person; in NT to mix one's self up in a thing, to involve one's self, be an accomplice in, Eph. 5:11; Rev. 18:4; to sympathize actively in, to relieve, Phil. 4:14*
vocabInfos._es_Definition: tomar parte en, participar en ; ayudar
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:
1) (藉著活動與他人相關) 連結
1a) 實際參與 (弗 5:11; 啟 18:4)
1b) 同情而感興趣 #腓 4:14|
vocabInfos._zh_Definition:
1) (借着活动与他人相关) 连结
1a) 实际参与 (弗 5:11; 启 18:4)
1b) 同情而感兴趣 #腓 4:14|
vocabInfos._vi_Definition: tham dự vào; chia sẻ với. σύν (G4862) + κοινωνέω (G2841)
